entries.title: Congressional Republicans and Democrats are pushing the Navy to award contracts for at least 15 submarines after delays, saying waiting any longer could harm the manufacturing base the Navy relies on
President Trump said the State of the Union was strong Tuesday night. The State of the Political Discourse? Not so much. Read more in today’s WSJ Politics Newsletter:
President Trump told a national audience in his State of the Union address that he had unleashed a new age of economic prosperity. One thing he didn’t say: I feel your pain.

President Trump delivered a State of the Union address as polls show him struggling to connect with the public on the economy and as Republicans brace for a challenging midterm election. Key takeaways.
